configureApiBridge.description: The activation state of the API Bridge for this Communications Gateway

endpointFqdns.description: FQDNs for sending requests to the API Bridge endpoint

allowedAddressPrefixes.description: The allowed source IP addresses or CIDR ranges for accessing the API Bridge

values.name: TenantReuse
values.description: Generated domain name label depends on resource name and tenant ID.

values.name: SubscriptionReuse
values.description: Generated domain name label depends on resource name, tenant ID and subscription ID.

values.name: ResourceGroupReuse
values.description: Generated domain name label depends on resource name, tenant ID, subscription ID and resource group name.

values.name: NoReuse
values.description: Generated domain name label is always unique.

connectivity.description: How to connect back to the operator network, e.g. MAPS

apiBridge.description: Details of API bridge functionality, if required

autoGeneratedDomainNameLabelScope.description: The scope at which the auto-generated domain name can be re-used

autoGeneratedDomainNameLabel.description: The autogenerated label used as part of the FQDNs for accessing the Communications Gateway

teamsVoicemailPilotNumber.description: This number is used in Teams Phone Mobile scenarios for access to the voicemail IVR from the native dialer.

integratedMcpEnabled.description: Whether an integrated Mobile Control Point is in use.

emergencyDialStrings.description: A list of dial strings used for emergency calling.

dnsDelegations.description: Details of DNS Domains to delegate to the Communications Gateway.

customSipHeaders.description: Custom SIP Header to add to any subscriber with a custom_header value, if required.

allocatedSignalingAddressPrefixes.description: A list of IP allocated prefixes which may be used to receive signaling data from this Communications Gateway.

allocatedMediaAddressPrefixes.description: A list of allocated IP prefixes which may be used to receive media data from this Communications Gateway.

values.name: ChangePending
values.description: The resource has been created or updated, but the CommunicationsGateway service has not yet been updated to reflect the changes.

values.name: Complete
values.description: The CommunicationsGateway service is up and running with the parameters specified in the resource.

values.name: G722
values.description: G.722 wideband audio codec

values.name: G722_2
values.description: G.722.2 wideband audio codec

values.name: SILK_8
values.description: SILK/8000 narrowband audio codec

values.description: SILK/16000 wideband audio codec
